home.description: I am passionate about turning complex ideas into scalable applications that deliver impact and performance.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Priyanshu Mandloi, a passionate Full Stack Developer who loves creating impactful, scalable, and performance-oriented web applications. With a solid foundation in C++, React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, I enjoy transforming complex ideas into clean, functional digital experiences. Currently studying Information Technology at IET DAVV, I've developed projects like PM Real Estate, a real-time property platform, and a Student Analytics Dashboard that enhances academic decision-making through data visualization. From solving over 700 LeetCode problems to collaborating on hackathons and team-oriented solutions, I always strive to push boundaries to learn, build, and create something meaningful.

details.title: Secondary Education
details.subtitle: Sanskar Academy, Thikri
details.description: I have successfully completed my 10th grade with a percentage of 80%.

details.title: Higher Secondary Education
details.subtitle: Gurukul School, Dhamnod
details.description: I have scored 88.3% in class 12th in PCM and cleared the JEE Mains exam in 2021 with 50644 AIR through self-study.

details.title: Graduation
details.subtitle: IET DAVV, Indore
details.description: I have completed my graduation from the Institute of Engineering and Technology (IET) DAVV, Indore with specialization in Information Technology. I have scored an overall 8.74 CGPA.

tasks: Built an ValetX web application using Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, enhancing user experience with a responsive design.
Built and optimized backend APIs using Java and Spring Boot, reducing response time by 30% and contributing to 70% of API modules.
Delivered 10+ backend features in Agile sprints, handled database integration, and participated in weekly code reviews.
Built and Dashboard for IET DAVV Exam Department using Looker studio and the MySQL database, enhancing data visualization and reporting.
